Generation V.Black: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
Generation V.White: Many famous songs have been inspired by the melodies that Meloetta plays.
Generation V.Black 2: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pokémon that hear them happy or sad.
Generation V.White 2: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pokémon that hear them happy or sad.
